window.name: NordicLogWindow
window.style: caption: 'nRF Connect Log'; icon: '$(StudioDir)/html/images/nordic_log_window_icon.svg'; dock-site: bottom-center-right

environment-setting.name: Nordic/CMakeExecutable
environment-setting.title: CMake Executable
environment-setting.description: Specifies the location of the CMake executable.

environment-setting.name: Nordic/PythonExecutable
environment-setting.title: Python Executable
environment-setting.description: Specifies the location of the Python executable.

environment-setting.name: Nordic/NinjaExecutable
environment-setting.title: Ninja Executable
environment-setting.description: Specifies the location of the Ninja executable.

environment-setting.name: Nordic/DTCExecutable
environment-setting.title: DTC Executable
environment-setting.description: Specifies the location of the DTC executable.

environment-setting.name: Nordic/CMakeOptions
environment-setting.title: Additional CMake Options
environment-setting.description: Specifies additional options to pass to CMake.

environment-setting.name: Nordic/MaxLogLines
environment-setting.title: Maximum Log Lines
environment-setting.description: Specifies the maximum number of lines in the nRF Connect log window

environment-setting.name: Nordic/ZephyrBase
environment-setting.title: Zephyr Base
environment-setting.description: Specifies the location of the Zephyr base directory

environment-setting.name: Nordic/ToolchainDir
environment-setting.title: GNU ARM Embedded Toolchain Directory
environment-setting.description: Specifies the location of the GNU ARM embedded toolchain directory
